#### **Bio** I am interested in gene regulation, lncRNAs, autoimmune disease, evolution and bioinformatics. Founding member of VieRnes de Bioinformatica en el LIIGH (bioinformatics fridays at \@[LIIGH-UNAM](https://twitter.com/LIIGH_UNAM)) \| web page: \| Github: [ViernesBioinfo2024](https://github.com/EveliaCoss/ViernesBioinfo2024) and [ViernesBioinfo2023](https://github.com/EveliaCoss/ViernesBioinfo2023) #### **Education** - **Postdoctoral Fellowship** \| \@[LIIGH-UNAM](https://twitter.com/LIIGH_UNAM) \| Dr. \@[Alejandra Medina-Rivera](https://twitter.com/AleMedinaRivera) \| February 2023 - Present - **The Carpentries** \| Certified Instructor with [The Carpentries](https://carpentries.org/) \| 2023 - Present - **PhD in Plant Biotechnology** \| \@[Cinvestav UGA-Langebio](https://twitter.com/uga_langebio), Mexico \| Dr. \@[Selene Fernandez-Valverde](https://twitter.com/SelFdz) \| August 2018 - January 2023 \| [Thesis](thesis/Tesis_PhD_ELCN.pdf) - **M. Sc., Plant Biotechnology** \| \@[Cinvestav UGA-Langebio](https://twitter.com/uga_langebio), Mexico \| Dr. Raúl Alvárez y Dr. Stefan de Folter \| Agosto 2016 - Julio 2018 \| [Thesis](thesis/Thesis_MsC_EveliaCoss.pdf) - **B.Sc.,Biotechnology Engineering** \| Universidad Politecnica de Sinaloa [\@UPSIN](https://upsin.edu.mx/) \| 2012-2016 #### **Experience** Member of the \@[JAGUAR Project](https://twitter.com/PJaguarLATAM), \@[R-ladies Morelia](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100093337606435), \@[RIABIO](https://twitter.com/RiaBioNet), \@[LupusRGMX](https://lupusrgmx.liigh.unam.mx/quienes-somos.html), \@[CDSB Mexico](https://twitter.com/CDSBMexico) and \@[ISCB RSG-Mexico](https://x.com/rsg_iscb_mexico?lang=es). #### **Repository Contributions** Webpage [Plants&Python](https://plantsandpython.github.io/PlantsAndPython/00_Opening_page.html) \| Github [Plants&Python](https://github.com/PlantsAndPython/PlantsAndPython) \| Dr. Daniel H. Chitwood, Dr. Robert VanBuren and Alejandra Rougon-Cardoso
